ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Radio JOVE HNRAO TFD+SDRPlay Spectrograph 16-24 MHz Dynamic Spectrogram Plots

RevisionEvent.Note: RadioJOVE: Resource Header Description reformated, One URL corrected for // typo in some files. Metadata submitted by J.M. Weygand on 2021-11-08, reviewed by LFB

ResourceHeader.Description: Dynamic Spectrogram plots from output of the HNRAO Terminated Folded Dipole and SDRPlay Spectrograph operating from 16-24 MHz. The plots are generated using the Radio-Sky Spectrograph software. The Display Cadence will vary but 8 hours is a reasonable maximum value for the timespan of a single file. Time is presented in Universal Time (UT). Both a RCP and a LCP dynamic spectrogram are produced as separate products.
